desc: Sustainable meets DIY. Create your own sustainable luxury candles. Perfect for repurposing your favorite vessels. Keep your home smells wonderful, while keep waste to an absolute minimum.

layout.text: Candle-making doesn’t have to be complicated.
We created a beginner-friendly, no mess DIY kit that includes locally grown soy wax, 100% cotton wicks, and toxic-free fragrance + essential oil blend.
